thread.title: Silicon Legal Strategy Welcomes Former Gunderson Dettmer Associate Jared Mayberry

author: cnbc.com
title: Silicon Legal Strategy Welcomes Former Gunderson Dettmer Associate Jared Mayberry

organizations.name: gunderson dettmer stough villeneuve franklin & hachigian, llp

text:
SAN FRANCISCO, March 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Silicon Legal Strategy today announced that Jared Mayberry has joined the firm as an associate in its San Francisco office. Jared is the second associate to join the team since January of this year.
Jared specializes in the representation of emerging growth and development stage companies, venture capital funds and angel investors in a variety of matters including entity formation, private equity and debt financings, mergers and acquisitions, restructurings, and general corporate governance counseling. Prior to joining Silicon Legal, Jared was an associate at Gunderson Dettmer Stough Villeneuve Franklin & Hachigian, LLP where he advised startups and venture capital funds.
Jared received his J.D. from the University of California, Berkeley and his B.S. in Business Administration from the University of Missouri, Columbia.
“Silicon Legal Strategy has built an excellent reputation in the startup and venture capital community for providing sound, business-minded advice to its clients,” said Mayberry. “I am very excited to be joining such a talented and well-rounded team as it continues to grow.” “Jared’s extensive background working with emerging growth companies makes him a perfect addition to our expanding team,” said Andre Gharakhanian, partner at Silicon Legal Strategy. “Jared’s experience is top-notch and we are thrilled to be growing the team with yet another rockstar hire.”
About Silicon Legal Strategy
Silicon Legal Strategy is the premier boutique law firm providing targeted, bottom-line-oriented advice to technology startups, innovative entrepreneurs and seasoned investors. Trained at the top firms in Silicon Valley, our attorneys and staff are incredibly passionate about technology and have extensive experience representing early stage companies and investors. We are a known quantity in Silicon Valley, and work with or sit across the table from every major law firm in the area. Perhaps most importantly, we ourselves are entrepreneurs. We truly understand the challenges of a startup -- like building and motivating a team, creating repeatable processes to ensure continued customer satisfaction at scale and dealing with infrastructure issues. We face these challenges every day -- and as a result, are able to deliver more relevant, bottom-line-oriented advice. Put simply, we actually "get" what entrepreneurs are going through.
